Html:
Hi!

I want to know if I could use NAudio to make 2 simple executable files,
one that plays audio streamed in a tcp port listen socket and
other that record audio and connect to a specified tcp socket host/port and streams there the recorded sound.

I know that is the inverse of traditional streaming daemons, but what I Want is to had one computer with speakers and others without speakers be able to stream their sound to the other computer.

Can this be possible with NAudio? which classes I need to use?

Thanks in advance.

To capture audio that is being played on one computer you would use WasapiLoopbackCapture. To play back streamed audio from the network, take a look at the NetworkChat demo source code in the NAudioDemo application

Cool! I will see that then.
Thanks.
